name: 41zero42 Futura Set 2
description: Collection 41ZERO42 FUTURA is an extraordinary project that has embodied in ceramic granite 15x15 cm the newly actual aesthetics of the German Bauhaus school. The authoritative edition INTERIOR DESIGN MAGAZINE has chosen 41ZERO42 FUTURA collection as the best in the category “Best of the year 2018 - Flooring Tile and Stone”. The archive contains compiled layouts from the series: 41zero42 Futura Gray 15x15 41zero42 Futura Grid Rose 15x15 41zero42 Futura Half Rose 15x15 41zero42 Futura Drop Rose 15x15 41zero42 Futura Rose 15x15 41zero42 Futura Black 15x15 41zero42 Futura Half Black 15x15 Show more
